mapper.sql: ID, CREATED_BY, CREATED_TIME, UPDATED_BY, UPDATED_TIME, UNIT, INCREMENT, CAPACITY
mapper.insert: insert into cycle (ID, CREATED_BY, CREATED_TIME, UPDATED_BY, UPDATED_TIME, UNIT, INCREMENT, CAPACITY) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updatedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{unit,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{increment,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{capacity,jdbcType=DECIMAL})

mapper.update:
update cycle
CREATED_BY = #{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATED_TIME = #{createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATED_BY = #{updatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATED_TIME = #{updatedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UNIT = #{unit,jdbcType=INTEGER},
INCREMENT = #{increment,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CAPACITY = #{capacity,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
